DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator wish compare Very Low-Density Lipoprotein ( VLDL ) kinetics type 2 diabetic male healthy male postabsorptive hyperinsulinemia . The kinetics obtain use ex-vivo VLDL1- VLDL2-triglyceride labeling technique . The investigator hypothesis investigator find increased VLDL1 production type 2 diabetic male , lower hyperinsulinemia . Also investigator wish investigate influence diet VLDL1 VLDL2 production healthy male , investigator expect less variance VLDL production subject give isocaloric diet .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Type 2 Diabetes Dietary Regulation VLDL1-and VLDL2-triglyceride Metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: Patients type 2 diabetes likely suffer dyslipidemia . Earlier research show patient increase VLDL production could key factor dyslipidemia development . Especially production VLDL1 seem increased inhibitory response insulin lacking . Further investigation VLDL1 VLDL2 kinetics require . The investigator wish : 1 . To extend method ex vivo label VLDL-triglyceride , include separate labeling VLDL1- VLDL2-triglyceride evaluation separate lipoprotein subtype kinetics . 2 . To investigate VLDL1- VLDL2-triglyceride kinetics post absorptive state experimental hyperinsulinemia twelve type 2 diabetic male compare twelve healthy age , sex , BMI match male . 3 . To investigate effect three day isocaloric diet compare non-restricted diet day-to-day variation VLDL1 VLDL2-triglyceride kinetics healthy men . The investigator examine six subject two different day ingest non-restricted diet compare group six subject examine two different day , prior ingest three day isocaloric diet .
